port.description: the port where the app should be running

controller-packages.description: Package list where the controllers ({@link com.github.aesteve.vertx.nubes.annotations.Controller}) are. Should contain all the packages where your controllers are located.

templates.description: The expected values are: "hbs" for Handlebars, "jade" for Jade, "templ" for MVEL and "thymeleaf" for Thymeleaf (for the last one, you need to use .html file extension).
